summary: Creates a directory for extra certificates, copies a root certificate file to the directory, and updates the system's CA certificates.

details.comment: Creates a directory for extra certificates, copies a root certificate file to the directory, and updates the system's CA certificates.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
sudo mkdir /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/extra
sudo cp certs/ca/ca.crt /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/extra/root.cert.crt
sudo update-ca-certificates
